titles.title: Sensible heat has significantly affected the global hydrological cycle over the historical period

custom_metadata.assertion: The original version of this Article omitted the ORCID ID of K.P. Shine: 0000-0003-2672-9978. This has been corrected in both the PDF and HTML versions of the Article.
The authors declare no competing interests.
